 https://t.co/bHNJ21Jq4s
.@OutsideVoiceCom Yes. A baseline is key to know what progress has been made. #OTFChat
.@andy_mcmullan @ONTrillium Have a baseline to compare like to like. #OTFChat
A2. Ask a simple Q to those who use the program/service. E.g. Ask them to rate on a scale of 1-10 how the program was useful. #OTFChat
.@yuniskariuki @mason_gillian Lots of choices. Ensuring clarity of your questions will help you decide. What tools do you use? #OTFChat
.@GTWomensPost Hi Greg. Absolutely. Knowing your progress is a key to success. #OTFChat
.@mason_gillian: Great Q! Keep it simple, don't try to do too much, and embed it into program delivery. #OTFChat
Hi everyone. I’m Benjamin-call me Ben, Evaluation and Impact Analyst & I’m also excited to be here. #OTFChat
